name: Shooter Pong
description:
Submission to PongJam

In this "Pong" Inspired game, you are the square white player, who can shoot bullets at the enemies coming at you. As you survive for longer and shoot enemies, your score goes higher and higher, but watch out! As soon as an enemy or even your own bullet touches you, the game is over, so stay vigilant. 

Controls:

Move Up/Left/Down/Right: WASD/Arrow Keys 

Shoot: Left click

Aim: Move Cursor
